bio:
Michael Ciccarelli is a freelance software engineer and consultant specializing in web development. He designs, codes and implements UIs and functional prototypes as a remote contractor based in Brooklyn, New York.

For over a decade, he has supported various brands and tech startups in enhancing their web presence and digital offerings. This website is my personal online identity and space for select client work, side projects, and experiments.

Currently immersed in the world of web3 and decentralized finance (DeFi) —
available for freelance, collaborations, and other opportunities.

projects.title: Farcaster Food Frames
projects.description: Farcaster Frame Development using Frog and Tailwind. The idea was to utilize Farcaster's new Frames standard, to demo a simple flow for visualizing token deployments onchain using the Metal.build smart contract deployment service.

projects.title: Metal
projects.description: dApp built with Next.js, Viem, & TailwindCSS. Single-click smart contract deployments, search for popular contracts, browse starter templates, and interact with them onchain.

projects.title: Over Abstraction
projects.description: Landing page for a crypto podcast series built with Next.js + TailwindCSS

projects.title: pod.xyz
projects.description: dApp built with Next.js, Ethers, and React Flow spatial interface for visualizing smart contracts and blockchain data.

projects.title: ELARA.WORLD
projects.description: Community site for Elara Pictures, to feature music, videos, and merch. Built with Next.js, Sanity, and Shopify headless.

projects.title: The BAR
projects.description: Portfolio site built with Next.js + Sanity.io headless CMS

projects.title: The Well
projects.description: Editorial and e-commerce site built with Next.js, Shopify, and Sanity

projects.title: Revolve Law
projects.description: Single-page website for a law firm, built with React and Framer motion.

projects.title: Common Studio
projects.description: Single-page, lead gen website, built with Next.js and Contentful CMS.

projects.title: G9 Ventures
projects.description: Portfolio site for a VC firm, built with React.js.

projects.title: VICELAND
projects.description: Video streaming for VICE, built with Next.js and Video.js

projects.title: Design Tool
projects.description: Tool for designers to configure custom wall panels, built with Vue and d3.js
